subject: Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Michael Matthews of Australia won the fifth stage of the Vuelta a España, and Vincenzo Nibali of Italy kept the overall lead ahead of Chris Horner of the United States.
snippet: Michael Matthews of Australia won the fifth stage of the Vuelta a España, and Vincenzo Nibali of Italy kept the overall lead ahead of Chris Horner of the United States.
